Dear Prof. Goodwin
  as Martin said, it would be great if a Cantera worksho=
p would be
held in Europe, especially in conjunction with the Combustion
Sy=
mposium. I am already waiting for it...
Regards
  Max

--- In cantera@yahoo=
groups.com, David Goodwin <dgoodwin@c...> wrote:
>
> At the first Cantera w=
orkshop in Chicago in 2004, we said something 
> about holding another one =
in conjunction with the Combustion Symposium 
> in Heidelberg in 2006.  Now=
 we need to decide whether to do it or not.  
> I'd like to get some sense =
of how useful people feel a Cantera workshop 
> would be, and how many migh=
t attend if it were held in Heidelberg on 
> Sunday, August 6.
> 
> If we d=
o it, I would like much of the workshop to consist of 
> contributed talks =
from Cantera users on what you are doing with Cantera 
> in research or tea=
ching.  But of course I could talk about future 
> directions for Cantera (=
or whatever else people are interested in) too.
> 
> Another option would b=
e to hold a workshop somewhere else.  This might 
> be preferred by non-com=
bustion Cantera users, who wouldn't be in 
> Heidelberg. (There's always th=
e "Westin La Cantera" golf resort near 
> San Antonio, Texas...)
> 
> Let m=
e know what you think, either by posting to the user's group, or 
> by send=
ing me an email message.
> 
> Thanks,
> Dave
